about_the_game:
This is a World War II anti-aircraft gun simulation shooting game based on virtual reality.
In this game, you will experience the intensity of the battle.
Try to shoot down as many enemy planes as you can before they destroy you.
detailed_description:
Attention

Due to the current low resolution of VR, it is difficult for players to distinguish aircraft at a distance of 1,000 meters or more in real time, and the aircraft displayed at this distance are small and unrecognizable; At the same time, the operation of anti-aircraft gun in tracking aircraft is very complicated, and it is difficult for players to simulate the tracking process with the game controller. Therefore, there is no anti-aircraft gun simulation game on Steam that allows players to simulate real-time tracking aircraft. Due to the limitations of current virtual reality technology, players cannot follow the anti-aircraft gun in a rotating motion, otherwise the player will feel severely dizzy. The game uses anti-aircraft gun automatic tracking enemy aircraft. The fun of the game lies in that every moment should pay attention to the most dangerous enemy aircraft, command anti-aircraft guns aimed at them, pull the trigger in time to destroy them, otherwise your flak will be destroyed.

short_description: Game Play:Use the joystick of the controller to Target the enemy bombers or fighters, and press the trigger of the controller to keep firing until they are eliminated. In the last three level, there will be other flaks to help you. However, you will counter more and stronger enemies.
